title: AI Impact Summit 2026: US, India Should Forge AI Tech Compact, New Report Suggests
description: A new US–India AI and Emerging Technology Compact calls for deeper collaboration in artificial intelligence to counter authoritarian tech models. Released ahead of the AI Impact Summit in Delhi, the report proposes a joint AI coalition, semiconductor alignment and a shared AI infrastructure stack to shape the global digital order.

title: AI Impact Summit 2026: World’s biggest tech leaders are coming to Delhi
description: New Delhi is set to host a landmark global AI event, AI Impact Summit 2026, next week. The event aims to bring together influential technologists, policymakers and innovators to shape the future of artificial intelligence. Google CEO Sundar Pichai, OpenAI CEO Sam Altman, and several other tech leaders are travelling to attend the event.
content:
The capital of India is set to take centre stage in the global artificial intelligence conversation as it hosts the AI Impact Summit 2026 from February 16–20 at Bharat Mandapam.
Touted as one of the largest AI events ever held, the summit will conven... [3364 chars]

title: Meta begins construction of $10 billion Indiana data center to boost AI capabilities
description: Meta said on Wednesday it was breaking ground on a $10 billion data center in Indiana, as it races to secure the massive amounts of computing power ​needed to support its artificial intelligence ambitions.

title: UK wealth managers stocks tumble as AI fears ripple across Europe
description: UK wealth management stocks St James’s Place and Quilter fell sharply on Wednesday, as concerns over potential disruption from artificial intelligence spread to the broader European financial sector, following a steep selloff in U.S. rival stocks.
